topicTitle: Request List of Admins and Moderators

posts.postText:
Request List of Admins and Moderators on TTT. 
Possibly add it to the MOTD. Admins on the left side of the logo, and Moderators on the right side of the logo.

This will allow players to know whose an admin / moderator. 


Unless you want to add who are VIPs as well, then possible admins / mods on left side and vips on the right. Since im guessing theres more vips than there are admins/mods together.


I just wanna know whose an admin / mod on TTT :D
Like I didn't know about the admin named.... Sanya until yesterday/2 days ago. Like I saw the name mentioned in 1 post and that was it, which was before I came to NNJG.


EDIT

or put it as a locked announcement of who is what and such?

>> Admins on the left side of the logo, and Moderators on the right side of the logo. 
 + support
 I think they should know who's who on the server, or at least Tell them what each color on TAB means.
Guys no need to discuss this, there is a thread for possible new logo for TTT that has the mod/admin/vip color description.

>> >> Admins on the left side of the logo, and Moderators on the right side of the logo. 
 + support
 I think they should know who's who on the server, or at least Tell them what each color on TAB means. 

Again I really don't think we need to have a list of who the admins are. It will only alert the minges when the admins join the server. It's obvious who is ranked ingame. And funny, it does tell you what each color means. Bottom of the Motd. *cough* Which somebody hasn't read recently. *cough* :3
 http://i41.photobucket.com/albums/e285/umean123/derp.png

O.o
I thought i read that..

Locking just because there isn't any need for this >.>
